data.text:
In Danny Hillis: Walt Disney, the Long Now, and Applied Minds

…Hillis and others established the Long Now Foundation, created to develop a multigenerational perspective on many issues facing civilization. The foundation’s most famous project was a mechanical clock designed to last for at least 10,000 years—an appropriate challenge for an unconventional and provocative thinker. In 2000 Hillis left Disney to…
